name: @ubilabs/google-maps-react-hooks
description: React hooks and map context provider for Google Maps

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && microbundle -o dist/index.js -f modern,umd --external react=React --sourcemap false --jsx React.createElement --no-compress --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json
scripts.dev: rm -rf dist/* && microbundle watch -o dist/index.js -f modern,umd --external react=React --sourcemap false --jsx React.createElement --no-compress --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run types
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.version: npm run changelog && git checkout -b chore/release-${npm_package_version} && git add .
scripts.postversion: git push -u origin chore/release-${npm_package_version} && git push --tags --no-verify
scripts.start:sample-map: cd examples && npm run clean-examples && npm i && npm run start:map
scripts.start:map-with-markers: cd examples && npm run clean-examples && npm i && npm run start:map-markers
scripts.start:autocomplete-example: cd examples && npm run clean-examples && npm run start:autocomplete
scripts.start:geocoding-example: cd examples && npm run clean-examples && npm i && npm run start:geocoding
